question: I earned 53 ECTS in the 4th semester and am worried that I will be exmatriculated. Can you confirm if this could be the case and what options I should consider for the winter semester?"
answer: You currently have 53 ECTS, but you need 60 ECTS. Are you still waiting for exam results that could help you? Please come to one of our open consultation hours to discuss your situation in detail and clarify your options.
